title: IRenderMaterial.SecondaryColor
description: Gets or sets the secondary color of the appearance.
remarks:
This property corresponds to the
Current
Color 2
control on the Color/Image tab of the Appearances PropertyManager page.
To get or set:
Current Color 1
, call
IRenderMaterial::PrimaryColor
.
Current Color 3
, call
IRenderMaterial::TertiaryColor
.
